hops.name: Ahtanum™
hops.description: Floral, earthy, citrus and grapefruit tones

hops.name: Amarillo®
hops.description: Floral, tropical, and citrus (lemon, orange and grapefruit) characteristics

hops.name: Bitter Gold
hops.description: No specific aroma characteristics

hops.name: Bravo
hops.description: Pleasant fruity and floral aroma characteristics

hops.name: Brewer’s Gold
hops.description: Spicy, fruity characteristics, black currant

hops.name: Bullion
hops.description: Strong and zesty blackcurrant characteristics

hops.name: Cascade
hops.description: Medium intense floral, citrus and grapefruit tones

hops.name: Cashmere
hops.description: Mild herbal aroma with strong melon, lemon, lime and slightly spicy notes

hops.name: Centennial
hops.description: Medium intensity floral and citrus (lemon) tones

hops.name: Chelan
hops.description: Mild floral and citrus characteristics

hops.name: Chinook
hops.description: Distinct, medium intensity spice and pine characteristics with subtle notes of grapefruit

hops.name: Citra®
hops.description: Strong citrus and tropical tones of grapefruit, melon, lime, gooseberry, passion fruit and lychee

hops.name: Cluster
hops.description: Strong floral and spicy characteristics

hops.name: Columbia
hops.description: Subtle earth and mild fruit tones

hops.name: Columbus
hops.description: Pungent, black pepper, licorice characteristics with subtle citrus overtones

hops.name: Comet
hops.description: A pungent, wild American aroma with citrus (grapefruit) flavors

hops.name: Crystal
hops.description: Mild, spicy and floral

hops.name: Equinox™
hops.description: A pronounced aroma profile with citrus, tropical fruit, floral and herbal characteristics. Specific descriptors include lemon, lime, papaya, apple, and green pepper.

hops.name: Eroica
hops.description: Forward fruit flavors

hops.name: Fuggle
hops.description: Mild wood and fruit characteristics

hops.name: Galaxy
hops.description: A unique hop aroma, described as a combination of citrus and passionfruit.

hops.name: Galena
hops.description: Spicy, blackcurrant and citrus (grapefruit) tones

hops.name: Glacier
hops.description: Pleasant hop aroma

hops.name: Golding
hops.description: Mild and delicate with sweet floral characteristics

hops.name: Hallertau
hops.description: Mild and pleasant, yet spicy, with herbal and floral characteristics

hops.name: Horizon
hops.description: Pleasant and spicy, with floral characteristics

hops.name: Liberty
hops.description: Mild and spicy with subtle lemon and citrus characteristics

hops.name: Magnum
hops.description: No distinct aroma characteristics

hops.name: Millennium
hops.description: Mild and resinous with floral and herbal tones

hops.name: Mosaic™
hops.description: A complex array of tropical fruit, citrus, berry, herbal, earthy and pine characteristics

hops.name: Motueka
hops.description: Citrus with lemon and lime followed by a background of tropical fruit.

hops.name: Mt. Hood
hops.description: Mild, herbal and somewhat pungent or spicy

hops.name: Mt. Rainier
hops.description: Excellent floral and noble aromas, with citrus and licorice overtones

hops.name: Nelson Sauvin
hops.description: Intensely fruity flavour and aroma with a strong suggestion of passionfruit.

hops.name: Newport
hops.description: Mild

hops.name: Northern Brewer
hops.description: Medium intensity, pine and mint characteristics

hops.name: Nugget
hops.description: Mild and pleasant with spicy, herbal tones

hops.name: Olympic
hops.description: Citrus characteristics with subtle spicy notes

hops.name: Palisade®
hops.description: Apricot, grass and clean floral characteristics

hops.name: Perle
hops.description: Slightly spicy with herbal and floral characteristics

hops.name: Saaz
hops.description: Mild spice and earth tones

hops.name: Santiam
hops.description: Slightly spicy with herbal and floral characteristics

hops.name: Simcoe®
hops.description: Unique passionfruit, pine, earth and citrus characteristics

hops.name: Sorachi Ace
hops.description: Unique lemon and dill characteristics

hops.name: Sterling
hops.description: Herbal and spicy, with a hint of floral, citrus (lemon/pineapple) characteristics

hops.name: Styrian Golding
hops.description: AKA Savinjski or Savinja Golding. Very mild, noble hop flavor. Nearly identical to Fuggle.

hops.name: Summit™
hops.description: Distinct spice, earthy, onion, garlic and citrus (pink grapefruit, orange and tangerine) tones

hops.name: Tahoma
hops.description: Predominate citrus and lemon notes with cedar, pine, floral, pepper and subtle green melon notes

hops.name: Tettnang
hops.description: Noble aroma that is pleasant and spicy

hops.name: TriplePearl
hops.description: Pleasant and balanced with notes of melon, orange citrus, resin, spice and pepper

hops.name: Ultra
hops.description: Mild and pleasant with spicy, floral tones

hops.name: Vanguard
hops.description: Herbal and floral tones

hops.name: Warrior®
hops.description: Mild and resinous with subtle citrus, pine and herbal characteristics

hops.name: Willamette
hops.description: Mild and pleasant, with slightly spicy and floral tones

hops.name: Yakima Gold
hops.description: Mild and pleasant
